name: SlimeDeliveryService
description:
Play as a slime in a hovercraft to deliver goodies and find your missing hats!

Made for 2022 epic megajam.

Slime controls : 
WASD to move 
Mouse to look around
E to interact
P to pause
H to change your hat if more than one has been found

Hovercraft Controls :
WASD to move 
Mouse to look around
T to start and stop the engine
V to go into jet mode
While in jet mode uses the arrow keys with WASD to control the hovercar.

GameAssets used :
Ultimate Quest Manager by Tala Esenlikler
EPIC GAMEJAM KIT
Stylized Medieval Village
Sounds and Music by https://www.weloveindies.com/
Hats used:
